channel.title: Racing wheels and tables
channel.description: So, after playing the Forza 2 demo from XBL, I've decided that I'm going to buy a racing wheel (and a copy of Forza 2 when it comes) However, I'll need a table for the wheel. Anyone got suggestions for a decent table?

item.title: Racing wheels and tables
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

So, after playing the Forza 2 demo from XBL, I’ve decided that I’m going to buy a racing wheel (and a copy of Forza 2 when it comes)
However, I’ll need a table for the wheel. Anyone got suggestions for a decent table?

Read full topic
